violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.88 (foreground color: #8cc4d9, background color: #1a5b7d, font size: 10.2pt (13.6px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.88 (foreground color: #8cc4d9, background color: #1a5b7d, font size: 15.3pt (20.4px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.88 (foreground color: #8cc4d9, background color: #1a5b7d, font size: 10.2pt (13.6px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Informational images missing meaningful alt text
